subject: Short Track Skating
lead_paragraph: Lee Ho-suk won the men’s 1,000 meters as South Korean skaters dominated the opening day at a World Cup short-track meet in Nagano, Japan, with three victories. Lee clocked a time of 1:26.930. Lee Sung-su won the men’s 1,500 in 2:18.073, edging the American Jeff Simon, who was second in 2:18.173.
